record.title: VOTE EXPLANATION

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I was hosting a home ownership fair in Wilmington, DE, that kicked off at 6 o'clock this morning. I ran into construction on I-95, ran into construction on New York Avenue, and arrived right at the end and missed the first vote.
On rollcall vote 186, I ask unanimous consent that the Record indicate that had I been present, I would have voted "yes."

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
